00031 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LQUOTA
00032 
00033 #include <obd_class.h>
00034 #include "qmt_internal.h"
00035 
00036 /*
00037  * Retrieve quota settings for a given identifier.
00038  *
00039  * \param env     - is the environment passed by the caller
00040  * \param qmt     - is the quota master target
00041  * \param pool_id - is the 16-bit pool identifier
00042  * \param restype - is the pool type, either block (i.e. LQUOTA_RES_DT) or inode
00043  *                  (i.e. LQUOTA_RES_MD)
00044  * \param qtype   - is the quota type
00045  * \param id      - is the quota indentifier for which we want to acces quota
00046  *                  settings.
00047  * \param hard    - is the output variable where to copy the hard limit
00048  * \param soft    - is the output variable where to copy the soft limit
00049  * \param time    - is the output variable where to copy the grace time
00050  */
00051 static int qmt_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct qmt_device *qmt,
00052                    __u16 pool_id, __u8 restype, __u8 qtype, union lquota_id *id,
00053                    __u64 *hard, __u64 *soft, __u64 *time)
00054 {
00055         struct lquota_entry     *lqe;
00056         ENTRY;
00057 
00058         /* look-up lqe structure containing quota settings */
00059         lqe = qmt_pool_lqe_lookup(env, qmt, pool_id, restype, qtype, id);
00060         if (IS_ERR(lqe))
00061                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(lqe));
00062 
00063         /* copy quota settings */
00064         lqe_read_lock(lqe);
00065         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "fetch settings");
00066         if (hard != NULL)
00067                 *hard = lqe->lqe_hardlimit;
00068         if (soft != NULL)
00069                 *soft = lqe->lqe_softlimit;
00070         if (time != NULL)
00071                 *time = lqe->lqe_gracetime;
00072         lqe_read_unlock(lqe);
00073 
00074         lqe_putref(lqe);
00075         RETURN(0);
00076 }
00077 
00078 /*
00079  * Update quota settings for a given identifier.
00080  *
00081  * \param env     - is the environment passed by the caller
00082  * \param qmt     - is the quota master target
00083  * \param pool_id - is the 16-bit pool identifier
00084  * \param restype - is the pool type, either block (i.e. LQUOTA_RES_DT) or inode
00085  *                  (i.e. LQUOTA_RES_MD)
00086  * \param qtype   - is the quota type
00087  * \param id      - is the quota indentifier for which we want to modify quota
00088  *                  settings.
00089  * \param hard    - is the new hard limit
00090  * \param soft    - is the new soft limit
00091  * \param time    - is the new grace time
00092  * \param valid   - is the list of settings to change
00093  */
00094 static int qmt_set(const struct lu_env *env, struct qmt_device *qmt,
00095                    __u16 pool_id, __u8 restype, __u8 qtype,
00096                    union lquota_id *id, __u64 hard, __u64 soft, __u64 time,
00097                    __u32 valid)
00098 {
00099         struct qmt_thread_info  *qti = qmt_info(env);
00100         struct lquota_entry     *lqe;
00101         struct thandle          *th = NULL;
00102         __u64                    ver, now;
00103         bool                     dirtied = false;
00104         int                      rc = 0;
00105         ENTRY;
00106 
00107         /* look-up quota entry associated with this ID */
00108         lqe = qmt_pool_lqe_lookup(env, qmt, pool_id, restype, qtype, id);
00109         if (IS_ERR(lqe))
00110                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(lqe));
00111 
00112         /* allocate & start transaction with enough credits to update quota
00113          * settings in the global index file */
00114         th = qmt_trans_start(env, lqe, &qti->qti_restore);
00115         if (IS_ERR(th))
00116                 GOTO(out_nolock, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00117 
00118         now = cfs_time_current_sec();
00119 
00120         lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00121         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "changing quota settings valid:%x hard:"LPU64" soft:"
00122                      LPU64" time:"LPU64, valid, hard, soft, time);
00123 
00124         if ((valid & QIF_TIMES) != 0 && lqe->lqe_gracetime != time) {
00125                 /* change time settings */
00126                 lqe->lqe_gracetime = time;
00127                 dirtied            = true;
00128         }
00129 
00130         if ((valid & QIF_LIMITS) != 0 &&
00131             (lqe->lqe_hardlimit != hard || lqe->lqe_softlimit != soft)) {
00132                 rc = qmt_validate_limits(lqe, hard, soft);
00133                 if (rc)
00134                         GOTO(out, rc);
00135 
00136                 /* recompute qunit in case it was never initialized */
00137                 qmt_revalidate(env, lqe);
00138 
00139                 /* change quota limits */
00140                 lqe->lqe_hardlimit = hard;
00141                 lqe->lqe_softlimit = soft;
00142 
00143                 /* clear grace time */
00144                 if (lqe->lqe_softlimit == 0 ||
00145                     lqe->lqe_granted <= lqe->lqe_softlimit)
00146                         /* no soft limit or below soft limit, let's clear grace
00147                          * time */
00148                         lqe->lqe_gracetime = 0;
00149                 else if ((valid & QIF_TIMES) == 0)
00150                         /* set grace only if user hasn't provided his own */
00151                          lqe->lqe_gracetime = now + qmt_lqe_grace(lqe);
00152 
00153                 /* change enforced status based on new parameters */
00154                 if (lqe->lqe_hardlimit == 0 && lqe->lqe_softlimit == 0)
00155                         lqe->lqe_enforced = false;
00156                 else
00157                         lqe->lqe_enforced = true;
00158 
00159                 dirtied = true;
00160         }
00161 
00162         if (dirtied) {
00163                 /* write new quota settings to disk */
00164                 rc = qmt_glb_write(env, th, lqe, LQUOTA_BUMP_VER, &ver);
00165                 if (rc) {
00166                         /* restore initial quota settings */
00167                         qmt_restore(lqe, &qti->qti_restore);
00168                         GOTO(out, rc);
00169                 }
00170 
00171                 /* compute new qunit value now that we have modified the quota
00172                  * settings */
00173                 qmt_adjust_qunit(env, lqe);
00174 
00175                 /* clear/set edquot flag as needed */
00176                 qmt_adjust_edquot(lqe, now);
00177         }
00178         EXIT;
00179 out:
00180         lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00181 out_nolock:
00182         lqe_putref(lqe);
00183 
00184         if (th != NULL && !IS_ERR(th))
00185                 dt_trans_stop(env, qmt->qmt_child, th);
00186 
00187         if (rc == 0 && dirtied)
00188                 qmt_glb_lock_notify(env, lqe, ver);
00189 
00190         return rc;
00191 }
00192 
00193 /*
00194  * Handle quotactl request.
00195  *
00196  * \param env   - is the environment passed by the caller
00197  * \param ld    - is the lu device associated with the qmt
00198  * \param oqctl - is the quotactl request
00199  */
00200 static int qmt_quotactl(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *ld,
00201                         struct obd_quotactl *oqctl)
00202 {
00203         struct qmt_thread_info  *qti = qmt_info(env);
00204         union lquota_id         *id  = &qti->qti_id;
00205         struct qmt_device       *qmt = lu2qmt_dev(ld);
00206         struct obd_dqblk        *dqb = &oqctl->qc_dqblk;
00207         int                      rc = 0;
00208         ENTRY;
00209 
00210         LASSERT(qmt != NULL);
00211 
00212         if (oqctl->qc_type >= MAXQUOTAS)
00213                 /* invalid quota type */
00214                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00215 
00216         switch (oqctl->qc_cmd) {
00217 
00218         case Q_GETINFO:  /* read grace times */
00219                 /* Global grace time is stored in quota settings of ID 0. */
00220                 id->qid_uid = 0;
00221 
00222                 /* read inode grace time */
00223                 rc = qmt_get(env, qmt, 0, LQUOTA_RES_MD, oqctl->qc_type, id,
00224                              NULL, NULL, &oqctl->qc_dqinfo.dqi_igrace);
00225                 if (rc)
00226                         break;
00227 
00228                 /* read block grace time */
00229                 rc = qmt_get(env, qmt, 0, LQUOTA_RES_DT, oqctl->qc_type, id,
00230                              NULL, NULL, &oqctl->qc_dqinfo.dqi_bgrace);
00231                 break;
00232 
00233         case Q_SETINFO:  /* modify grace times */
00234                 /* setinfo should be using dqi->dqi_valid, but lfs incorrectly
00235                  * sets the valid flags in dqb->dqb_valid instead, try to live
00236                  * with that ... */
00237 
00238                 /* Global grace time is stored in quota settings of ID 0. */
00239                 id->qid_uid = 0;
00240 
00241                 if ((dqb->dqb_valid & QIF_ITIME) != 0) {
00242                         /* set inode grace time */
00243                         rc = qmt_set(env, qmt, 0, LQUOTA_RES_MD, oqctl->qc_type,
00244                                      id, 0, 0, oqctl->qc_dqinfo.dqi_igrace,
00245                                      QIF_TIMES);
00246                         if (rc)
00247                                 break;
00248                 }
00249 
00250                 if ((dqb->dqb_valid & QIF_BTIME) != 0)
00251                         /* set block grace time */
00252                         rc = qmt_set(env, qmt, 0, LQUOTA_RES_DT, oqctl->qc_type,
00253                                      id, 0, 0, oqctl->qc_dqinfo.dqi_bgrace,
00254                                      QIF_TIMES);
00255                 break;
00256 
00257         case Q_GETQUOTA: /* consult quota limit */
00258                 /* There is no quota limit for root user & group */
00259                 if (oqctl->qc_id == 0) {
00260                         memset(dqb, 0, sizeof(*dqb));
00261                         dqb->dqb_valid = QIF_LIMITS | QIF_TIMES;
00262                         break;
00263                 }
00264                 /* extract quota ID from quotactl request */
00265                 id->qid_uid = oqctl->qc_id;
00266 
00267                 /* look-up inode quota settings */
00268                 rc = qmt_get(env, qmt, 0, LQUOTA_RES_MD, oqctl->qc_type, id,
00269                              &dqb->dqb_ihardlimit, &dqb->dqb_isoftlimit,
00270                              &dqb->dqb_itime);
00271                 if (rc)
00272                         break;
00273 
00274                 dqb->dqb_valid |= QIF_ILIMITS | QIF_ITIME;
00275                 /* master isn't aware of actual inode usage */
00276                 dqb->dqb_curinodes = 0;
00277 
00278                 /* look-up block quota settings */
00279                 rc = qmt_get(env, qmt, 0, LQUOTA_RES_DT, oqctl->qc_type, id,
00280                              &dqb->dqb_bhardlimit, &dqb->dqb_bsoftlimit,
00281                              &dqb->dqb_btime);
00282                 if (rc)
00283                         break;
00284 
00285                 dqb->dqb_valid |= QIF_BLIMITS | QIF_BTIME;
00286                 /* master doesn't know the actual block usage */
00287                 dqb->dqb_curspace = 0;
00288                 break;
00289 
00290         case Q_SETQUOTA: /* change quota limits */
00291                 if (oqctl->qc_id == 0)
00292                         /* can't enforce a quota limit for root user & group */
00293                         RETURN(-EPERM);
00294                 /* extract quota ID from quotactl request */
00295                 id->qid_uid = oqctl->qc_id;
00296 
00297                 if ((dqb->dqb_valid & QIF_IFLAGS) != 0) {
00298                         /* update inode quota settings */
00299                         rc = qmt_set(env, qmt, 0, LQUOTA_RES_MD, oqctl->qc_type,
00300                                      id, dqb->dqb_ihardlimit,
00301                                      dqb->dqb_isoftlimit, dqb->dqb_itime,
00302                                      dqb->dqb_valid & QIF_IFLAGS);
00303                         if (rc)
00304                                 break;
00305                 }
00306 
00307                 if ((dqb->dqb_valid & QIF_BFLAGS) != 0)
00308                         /* update block quota settings */
00309                         rc = qmt_set(env, qmt, 0, LQUOTA_RES_DT, oqctl->qc_type,
00310                                      id, dqb->dqb_bhardlimit,
00311                                      dqb->dqb_bsoftlimit, dqb->dqb_btime,
00312                                      dqb->dqb_valid & QIF_BFLAGS);
00313                 break;
00314 
00315         default:
00316                 CERROR("%s: unsupported quotactl command: %d\n",
00317                        qmt->qmt_svname, oqctl->qc_cmd);
00318                 RETURN(-ENOTSUPP);
00319         }
00320 
00321         RETURN(rc);
00322 }
00323 
00324 /*
00325  * Helper function to handle quota request from slave.
00326  *
00327  * \param env     - is the environment passed by the caller
00328  * \param lqe     - is the lquota_entry subject to the quota request
00329  * \param qmt     - is the master device
00330  * \param uuid    - is the uuid associated with the slave
00331  * \param qb_flags - are the quota request flags as packed in the quota_body
00332  * \param qb_count - is the amount of quota space the slave wants to
00333  *                   acquire/release
00334  * \param qb_usage - is the current space usage on the slave
00335  * \param repbody - is the quota_body of reply
00336  *
00337  * \retval 0            : success
00338  * \retval -EDQUOT      : out of quota
00339  *         -EINPROGRESS : inform client to retry write/create
00340  *         -ve          : other appropriate errors
00341  */
00342 int qmt_dqacq0(const struct lu_env *env, struct lquota_entry *lqe,
00343                struct qmt_device *qmt, struct obd_uuid *uuid, __u32 qb_flags,
00344                __u64 qb_count, __u64 qb_usage, struct quota_body *repbody)
00345 {
00346         struct qmt_thread_info  *qti = qmt_info(env);
00347         __u64                    now, count;
00348         struct dt_object        *slv_obj = NULL;
00349         __u64                    slv_granted, slv_granted_bck;
00350         struct thandle          *th = NULL;
00351         int                      rc, ret;
00352         ENTRY;
00353 
00354         LASSERT(uuid != NULL);
00355 
00356         /* initialize reply */
00357         memset(repbody, 0, sizeof(*repbody));
00358         memcpy(&repbody->qb_id, &lqe->lqe_id, sizeof(repbody->qb_id));
00359 
00360         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_QUOTA_RECOVERABLE_ERR))
00361                 RETURN(-cfs_fail_val);
00362 
00363         /* look-up index file associated with acquiring slave */
00364         slv_obj = lquota_disk_slv_find(env, qmt->qmt_child, LQE_ROOT(lqe),
00365                                        lu_object_fid(&LQE_GLB_OBJ(lqe)->do_lu),
00366                                        uuid);
00367         if (IS_ERR(slv_obj))
00368                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(slv_obj));
00369 
00370         /* pack slave fid in reply just for sanity check */
00371         memcpy(&repbody->qb_slv_fid, lu_object_fid(&slv_obj->do_lu),
00372                sizeof(struct lu_fid));
00373 
00374         /* allocate & start transaction with enough credits to update
00375          * global & slave indexes */
00376         th = qmt_trans_start_with_slv(env, lqe, slv_obj, &qti->qti_restore);
00377         if (IS_ERR(th))
00378                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00379 
00380         lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00381         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "dqacq starts uuid:%s flags:0x%x wanted:"LPU64
00382                      " usage:"LPU64, obd_uuid2str(uuid), qb_flags, qb_count,
00383                      qb_usage);
00384 
00385         /* Legal race, limits have been removed on master, but slave didn't
00386          * receive the change yet. Just return EINPROGRESS until the slave gets
00387          * notified. */
00388         if (!lqe->lqe_enforced && !req_is_rel(qb_flags))
00389                 GOTO(out_locked, rc = -ESRCH);
00390 
00391         /* recompute qunit in case it was never initialized */
00392         qmt_revalidate(env, lqe);
00393 
00394         /* slave just wants to acquire per-ID lock */
00395         if (req_is_acq(qb_flags) && qb_count == 0)
00396                 GOTO(out_locked, rc = 0);
00397 
00398         /* fetch how much quota space is already granted to this slave */
00399         rc = qmt_slv_read(env, lqe, slv_obj, &slv_granted);
00400         if (rc) {
00401                 LQUOTA_ERROR(lqe, "Failed to get granted for slave %s, rc=%d",
00402                              obd_uuid2str(uuid), rc);
00403                 GOTO(out_locked, rc);
00404         }
00405         /* recall how much space this slave currently owns in order to restore
00406          * it in case of failure */
00407         slv_granted_bck = slv_granted;
00408 
00409         /* record current time for soft limit & grace time management */
00410         now = (__u64)cfs_time_current_sec();
00411 
00412         if (req_is_rel(qb_flags)) {
00413                 /* Slave would like to release quota space */
00414                 if (slv_granted < qb_count ||
00415                     lqe->lqe_granted < qb_count) {
00416                         /* can't release more than granted */
00417                         LQUOTA_ERROR(lqe, "Release too much! uuid:%s release:"
00418                                      LPU64" granted:"LPU64", total:"LPU64,
00419                                      obd_uuid2str(uuid), qb_count,
00420                                      slv_granted, lqe->lqe_granted);
00421                         GOTO(out_locked, rc = -EINVAL);
00422                 }
00423 
00424                 repbody->qb_count = qb_count;
00425                 /* put released space back to global pool */
00426                 QMT_REL(lqe, slv_granted, qb_count);
00427                 GOTO(out_write, rc = 0);
00428         }
00429 
00430         if (req_has_rep(qb_flags) && slv_granted < qb_usage) {
00431                 /* Slave is reporting space usage in quota request and it turns
00432                  * out to be using more quota space than owned, so we adjust
00433                  * granted space regardless of the current state of affairs */
00434                 repbody->qb_count = qb_usage - slv_granted;
00435                 QMT_GRANT(lqe, slv_granted, repbody->qb_count);
00436         }
00437 
00438         if (!req_is_acq(qb_flags) && !req_is_preacq(qb_flags))
00439                 GOTO(out_write, rc = 0);
00440 
00441         qmt_adjust_edquot(lqe, now);
00442         if (lqe->lqe_edquot)
00443                 /* no hope to claim further space back */
00444                 GOTO(out_write, rc = -EDQUOT);
00445 
00446         if (qmt_space_exhausted(lqe, now)) {
00447                 /* might have some free space once rebalancing is completed */
00448                 rc = req_is_acq(qb_flags) ? -EINPROGRESS : -EDQUOT;
00449                 GOTO(out_write, rc);
00450         }
00451 
00452         if (req_is_preacq(qb_flags)) {
00453                 /* slave would like to pre-acquire quota space. To do so, it
00454                  * reports in qb_count how much spare quota space it owns and we
00455                  * can grant back quota space which is consistent with qunit
00456                  * value. */
00457 
00458                 if (qb_count >= lqe->lqe_qunit)
00459                         /* slave already own the maximum it should */
00460                         GOTO(out_write, rc = 0);
00461 
00462                 count = qmt_alloc_expand(lqe, slv_granted, qb_count);
00463                 if (count == 0)
00464                         GOTO(out_write, rc = -EDQUOT);
00465 
00466                 repbody->qb_count += count;
00467                 QMT_GRANT(lqe, slv_granted, count);
00468                 GOTO(out_write, rc = 0);
00469         }
00470 
00471         /* processing acquire request with clients waiting */
00472         if (lqe->lqe_hardlimit != 0 &&
00473             lqe->lqe_granted + qb_count > lqe->lqe_hardlimit) {
00474                 /* cannot grant as much as asked, but can still afford to grant
00475                  * some quota space back */
00476                 count = lqe->lqe_hardlimit - lqe->lqe_granted;
00477                 repbody->qb_count += count;
00478                 QMT_GRANT(lqe, slv_granted, count);
00479                 GOTO(out_write, rc = 0);
00480         }
00481 
00482         /* Whouhou! we can satisfy the slave request! */
00483         repbody->qb_count += qb_count;
00484         QMT_GRANT(lqe, slv_granted, qb_count);
00485 
00486         /* Try to expand the acquired count for DQACQ */
00487         count = qmt_alloc_expand(lqe, slv_granted, 0);
00488         if (count != 0) {
00489                 /* can even grant more than asked, it is like xmas ... */
00490                 repbody->qb_count += count;
00491                 QMT_GRANT(lqe, slv_granted, count);
00492                 GOTO(out_write, rc = 0);
00493         }
00494 
00495         GOTO(out_write, rc = 0);
00496 out_write:
00497         if (repbody->qb_count == 0)
00498                 GOTO(out_locked, rc);
00499 
00500         /* start/stop grace timer if required */
00501         if (lqe->lqe_softlimit != 0) {
00502                 if (lqe->lqe_granted > lqe->lqe_softlimit &&
00503                     lqe->lqe_gracetime == 0)
00504                         /* first time over soft limit, let's start grace
00505                          * timer */
00506                         lqe->lqe_gracetime = now + qmt_lqe_grace(lqe);
00507                 else if (lqe->lqe_granted <= lqe->lqe_softlimit &&
00508                          lqe->lqe_gracetime != 0)
00509                         /* Clear grace timer */
00510                         lqe->lqe_gracetime = 0;
00511         }
00512 
00513         /* Update slave index first since it is easier to roll back */
00514         ret = qmt_slv_write(env, th, lqe, slv_obj, LQUOTA_BUMP_VER,
00515                             &repbody->qb_slv_ver, slv_granted);
00516         if (ret) {
00517                 /* restore initial quota settings */
00518                 qmt_restore(lqe, &qti->qti_restore);
00519                 /* reset qb_count */
00520                 repbody->qb_count = 0;
00521                 GOTO(out_locked, rc = ret);
00522         }
00523 
00524         /* Update global index, no version bump needed */
00525         ret = qmt_glb_write(env, th, lqe, 0, NULL);
00526         if (ret) {
00527                 rc = ret;
00528                 /* restore initial quota settings */
00529                 qmt_restore(lqe, &qti->qti_restore);
00530                 /* reset qb_count */
00531                 repbody->qb_count = 0;
00532 
00533                 /* restore previous granted value */
00534                 ret = qmt_slv_write(env, th, lqe, slv_obj, 0, NULL,
00535                                     slv_granted_bck);
00536                 if (ret) {
00537                         LQUOTA_ERROR(lqe, "failed to restore initial slave "
00538                                      "value rc:%d ret%d", rc, ret);
00539                         LBUG();
00540                 }
00541                 qmt_adjust_edquot(lqe, now);
00542                 GOTO(out_locked, rc);
00543         }
00544 
00545         /* Total granted has been changed, let's try to adjust the qunit
00546          * size according to the total granted & limits. */
00547         qmt_adjust_qunit(env, lqe);
00548 
00549         /* clear/set edquot flag and notify slaves via glimpse if needed */
00550         qmt_adjust_edquot(lqe, now);
00551 out_locked:
00552         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "dqacq ends count:"LPU64" ver:"LPU64" rc:%d",
00553                      repbody->qb_count, repbody->qb_slv_ver, rc);
00554         lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00555 out:
00556         if (th != NULL && !IS_ERR(th))
00557                 dt_trans_stop(env, qmt->qmt_child, th);
00558 
00559         if (slv_obj != NULL && !IS_ERR(slv_obj))
00560                 lu_object_put(env, &slv_obj->do_lu);
00561 
00562         if ((req_is_acq(qb_flags) || req_is_preacq(qb_flags)) &&
00563             OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_QUOTA_EDQUOT)) {
00564                 /* introduce inconsistency between granted value in slave index
00565                  * and slave index copy of slave */
00566                 repbody->qb_count = 0;
00567                 rc = -EDQUOT;
00568         }
00569 
00570         RETURN(rc);
00571 }
00572 
00573 /*
00574  * Handle quota request from slave.
00575  *
00576  * \param env  - is the environment passed by the caller
00577  * \param ld   - is the lu device associated with the qmt
00578  * \param req  - is the quota acquire request
00579  */
00580 static int qmt_dqacq(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *ld,
00581                      struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00582 {
00583         struct qmt_device       *qmt = lu2qmt_dev(ld);
00584         struct quota_body       *qbody, *repbody;
00585         struct obd_uuid         *uuid;
00586         struct ldlm_lock        *lock;
00587         struct lquota_entry     *lqe;
00588         int                      pool_id, pool_type, qtype;
00589         int                      rc;
00590         ENTRY;
00591 
00592         qbody = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_QUOTA_BODY);
00593         if (qbody == NULL)
00594                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
00595 
00596         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_QUOTA_BODY);
00597         if (repbody == NULL)
00598                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
00599 
00600         /* verify if global lock is stale */
00601         if (!lustre_handle_is_used(&qbody->qb_glb_lockh))
00602                 RETURN(-ENOLCK);
00603 
00604         lock = ldlm_handle2lock(&qbody->qb_glb_lockh);
00605         if (lock == NULL)
00606                 RETURN(-ENOLCK);
00607         LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
00608 
00609         uuid = &req->rq_export->exp_client_uuid;
00610 
00611         if (req_is_rel(qbody->qb_flags) + req_is_acq(qbody->qb_flags) +
00612             req_is_preacq(qbody->qb_flags) > 1) {
00613                 CERROR("%s: malformed quota request with conflicting flags set "
00614                        "(%x) from slave %s\n", qmt->qmt_svname,
00615                        qbody->qb_flags, obd_uuid2str(uuid));
00616                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00617         }
00618 
00619         if (req_is_acq(qbody->qb_flags) || req_is_preacq(qbody->qb_flags)) {
00620                 /* acquire and pre-acquire should use a valid ID lock */
00621 
00622                 if (!lustre_handle_is_used(&qbody->qb_lockh))
00623                         RETURN(-ENOLCK);
00624 
00625                 lock = ldlm_handle2lock(&qbody->qb_lockh);
00626                 if (lock == NULL)
00627                         /* no lock associated with this handle */
00628                         RETURN(-ENOLCK);
00629 
00630                 LDLM_DEBUG(lock, "%sacquire request",
00631                            req_is_preacq(qbody->qb_flags) ? "pre" : "");
00632 
00633                 if (!obd_uuid_equals(&lock->l_export->exp_client_uuid, uuid)) {
00634                         /* sorry, no way to cheat ... */
00635                         LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
00636                         RETURN(-ENOLCK);
00637                 }
00638 
00639                 if (ldlm_is_ast_sent(lock)) {
00640                         struct ptlrpc_service_part      *svc;
00641                         unsigned int                     timeout;
00642 
00643                         svc = req->rq_rqbd->rqbd_svcpt;
00644                         timeout = at_est2timeout(at_get(&svc->scp_at_estimate));
00645                         timeout += (ldlm_bl_timeout(lock) >> 1);
00646 
00647                         /* lock is being cancelled, prolong timeout */
00648                         ldlm_refresh_waiting_lock(lock, timeout);
00649                 }
00650                 LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
00651         }
00652 
00653         /* extract pool & quota information from global index FID packed in the
00654          * request */
00655         rc = lquota_extract_fid(&qbody->qb_fid, &pool_id, &pool_type, &qtype);
00656         if (rc)
00657                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00658 
00659         /* Find the quota entry associated with the quota id */
00660         lqe = qmt_pool_lqe_lookup(env, qmt, pool_id, pool_type, qtype,
00661                                   &qbody->qb_id);
00662         if (IS_ERR(lqe))
00663                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(lqe));
00664 
00665         /* process quota request */
00666         rc = qmt_dqacq0(env, lqe, qmt, uuid, qbody->qb_flags, qbody->qb_count,
00667                         qbody->qb_usage, repbody);
00668 
00669         if (lustre_handle_is_used(&qbody->qb_lockh))
00670                 /* return current qunit value only to slaves owning an per-ID
00671                  * quota lock. For enqueue, the qunit value will be returned in
00672                  * the LVB */
00673                  repbody->qb_qunit = lqe->lqe_qunit;
00674         lqe_putref(lqe);
00675         RETURN(rc);
00676 }
00677 
00678 /* Vector of quota request handlers. This vector is used by the MDT to forward
00679  * requests to the quota master. */
00680 struct qmt_handlers qmt_hdls = {
00681         /* quota request handlers */
00682         .qmth_quotactl          = qmt_quotactl,
00683         .qmth_dqacq             = qmt_dqacq,
00684 
00685         /* ldlm handlers */
00686         .qmth_intent_policy     = qmt_intent_policy,
00687         .qmth_lvbo_init         = qmt_lvbo_init,
00688         .qmth_lvbo_update       = qmt_lvbo_update,
00689         .qmth_lvbo_size         = qmt_lvbo_size,
00690         .qmth_lvbo_fill         = qmt_lvbo_fill,
00691         .qmth_lvbo_free         = qmt_lvbo_free,
00692 };
00693 EXPORT_SYMBOL(qmt_hdls);
